label: 因事管隷
本: The Comparative Study of the Ritsuryo Bureaucracy in Ancient Japan and T'ang China. ACTA ASIATICA, 99 . The Tōhō Gakkai . 2010-08
説明文: The relationship between the Board of Controllers, representing the administrative organ of the Grand Council of State, and the eight ministries is deemed to have been one in which each had its own area of competence.
